verses.verse: I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of the loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> With my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> I will make known <S%H3045><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

I indeed declare, <S%H559><s%> "Love <S%H2617><s%> stands firm <S%H1129><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> You established <S%H3559><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%> Your faithfulness is in them. <S%H530><s%>"
"I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with my chosen <S%H972><s%> one, <S%H7650><s%> I have sworn to David, <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%>

<S%H3559><s%> 'I will establish your seed <S%H2233><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and build up <S%H1129><s%> your throne <S%H3678><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>'" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> will praise <S%H3034><s%> your wonders, <S%H6382><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> also in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the holy ones. <S%H6918><s%>

For who in the skies <S%H7834><s%> can be compared <S%H6186><s%> to Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%> Who among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the heavenly <S%H410><s%> beings is like <S%H1819><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%>
a very <S%H7227><s%> awesome <S%H6206><s%> God <S%H410><s%> in the council <S%H5475><s%> of the holy <S%H6918><s%> ones, <S%H3372><s%> to be feared above all those who are around him? <S%H5439><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> who is a mighty <S%H2626><s%> one, <S%H3050><s%> like you? Yah, your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> is around you. <S%H5439><s%>
You rule <S%H4910><s%> the pride <S%H1348><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%> When its waves <S%H1530><s%> rise <S%H7721><s%> up, <S%H7623><s%> you calm them.

You have broken <S%H1792><s%> Rahab <S%H7294><s%> in pieces, <S%H1792><s%> like one of the slain. <S%H2491><s%> You have scattered <S%H6340><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> with your mighty <S%H5797><s%> arm. <S%H2220><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are yours. <S%H776><s%> The earth also is yours; <S%H8398><s%> the world and its fullness. <S%H4393><s%> You have founded them. <S%H3245><s%>
The north <S%H6828><s%> and the south, <S%H3225><s%> you have created <S%H1254><s%> them. <S%H8396><s%> Tabor and Hermon <S%H2768><s%> rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in your name. <S%H8034><s%>
You have a mighty <S%H1369><s%> arm. <S%H2220><s%> Your hand <S%H3027><s%> is strong, <S%H5810><s%> and your right hand <S%H3027><s%> is exalted. <S%H7311><s%>

Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and justice <S%H6664><s%> are the foundation <S%H4349><s%> of your throne. <S%H3678><s%> Loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> go <S%H6923><s%> before your face. <S%H6440><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> who learn <S%H3045><s%> to acclaim <S%H8643><s%> you. <S%H1980><s%> They walk in the light <S%H216><s%> of your presence, <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
In your name <S%H8034><s%> they rejoice <S%H1523><s%> all day. <S%H3117><s%> In your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> they are exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
For you are the glory <S%H8597><s%> of their strength. <S%H5797><s%> In your favor, <S%H7522><s%> our horn <S%H7161><s%> will be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
For our shield <S%H4043><s%> belongs to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> our king <S%H4428><s%> to the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then you spoke <S%H1696><s%> in vision <S%H2377><s%> to your saints, <S%H2623><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "I have bestowed <S%H7737><s%> strength <S%H5828><s%> on the warrior. <S%H1368><s%> I have exalted <S%H7311><s%> a young man <S%H977><s%> from the people. <S%H5971><s%>
I have found <S%H4672><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> my servant. <S%H5650><s%> I have anointed <S%H4886><s%> him with my holy <S%H6944><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%>
with whom my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be established. <S%H3559><s%> My arm <S%H2220><s%> will also strengthen him. <S%H553><s%>
No enemy <S%H341><s%> will tax <S%H5378><s%> him. <S%H5766><s%> No wicked man <S%H1121><s%> will oppress him. <S%H6031><s%>
I will beat down <S%H3807><s%> his adversaries <S%H6862><s%> before him, <S%H6440><s%> and strike <S%H5062><s%> those who hate him. <S%H8130><s%>
But my faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and my loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> will be with him. <S%H8034><s%> In my name, his horn <S%H7161><s%> will be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
I will set <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> also on the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and his right hand <S%H3225><s%> on the rivers. <S%H5104><s%>
He will call <S%H7121><s%> to me, <S%H1><s%> 'You are my Father, my God, <S%H410><s%> and the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my salvation! <S%H3444><s%>'
I will also appoint <S%H5414><s%> him my firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> the highest <S%H5945><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
I will keep <S%H8104><s%> my loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> for him forevermore. <S%H5769><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> will stand firm with him. <S%H539><s%>
I will also make <S%H7760><s%> his seed <S%H2233><s%> endure forever, <S%H5703><s%> and his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
If his children <S%H1121><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> my law, <S%H8451><s%> and don't <S%H3212><s%> walk in my ordinances; <S%H4941><s%>
if they break <S%H2490><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and don't <S%H8104><s%> keep my commandments; <S%H4687><s%>
then I will punish <S%H6485><s%> their sin <S%H6588><s%> with the rod, <S%H7626><s%> and their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> with stripes. <S%H5061><s%>
But I will not completely take <S%H6331><s%> my loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> from him, <S%H530><s%> nor allow my faithfulness to fail. <S%H8266><s%>
I will not break <S%H2490><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> nor alter <S%H8138><s%> what my lips <S%H8193><s%> have uttered. <S%H4161><s%>
Once <S%H259><s%> have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> by my holiness, <S%H6944><s%> I will not lie <S%H3576><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%>
His seed <S%H2233><s%> will endure forever, <S%H5769><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> like the sun before me. <S%H8121><s%>
It will be established <S%H3559><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> like the moon, <S%H3394><s%> the faithful <S%H539><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> in the sky. <S%H7834><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But you have rejected <S%H2186><s%> and spurned. <S%H3988><s%> You have been angry <S%H5674><s%> with your anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
You have renounced <S%H5010><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of your servant. <S%H5650><s%> You have defiled <S%H2490><s%> his crown <S%H5145><s%> in the dust. <S%H776><s%>
You have broken down <S%H6555><s%> all his hedges. <S%H1448><s%> You have brought <S%H7760><s%> his strongholds <S%H4013><s%> to ruin. <S%H4288><s%>
All who pass by <S%H5674><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> rob <S%H8155><s%> him. <S%H2781><s%> He has become a reproach to his neighbors. <S%H7934><s%>
You have exalted <S%H7311><s%> the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of his adversaries. <S%H6862><s%> You have made all of his enemies <S%H341><s%> rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>
Yes, <S%H7725><s%> you turn back the edge <S%H6697><s%> of his sword, <S%H2719><s%> and haven't <S%H6965><s%> supported him in battle. <S%H4421><s%>
You have ended <S%H7673><s%> his splendor, <S%H2892><s%> and thrown <S%H4048><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> down <S%H4048><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
You have shortened <S%H7114><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth. <S%H5934><s%> You have covered <S%H5844><s%> him with shame. <S%H955><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
How long, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh? Will you hide <S%H5641><s%> yourself forever? <S%H5331><s%> Will your wrath <S%H2534><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like fire? <S%H784><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> how short <S%H2465><s%> my time is! <S%H7723><s%> For what vanity have you created all the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H1121><s%>

What man <S%H1397><s%> is he who shall live <S%H2421><s%> and not see <S%H7200><s%> death, <S%H4194><s%> who shall deliver <S%H4422><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of Sheol? <S%H7585><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> where are your former <S%H7223><s%> loving kindnesses, <S%H2617><s%> which you swore <S%H7650><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> in your faithfulness? <S%H530><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of your servants, <S%H5650><s%> how I bear <S%H5375><s%> in my heart <S%H2436><s%> the taunts of all the mighty <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%>
With which your enemies <S%H341><s%> have mocked, <S%H2778><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> with which they have mocked <S%H2778><s%> the footsteps <S%H6119><s%> of your anointed one. <S%H4899><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%> Amen, <S%H543><s%> and Amen. <S%H543><s%>
